title: Segmentation fault on program counter
vulnerability_information:
Mruby running on linux x64
gcc version 4.8.4 (Ubuntu 4.8.4-2ubuntu1~14.04.3)

poc
```
for i in methods Kernel.initialize.public_methods print
print %i[0 0 0 0]end
```
 
output

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the holiday period and the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash, and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3397

Hi @icanthack, I just confirmed that this commit fixes the issue you reported: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/38acb9ec36bdd56123e6680885499fbf7f729f21. Since this is fixed upstream, I'll close this issue as Resolved now.

For your information, we usually do payouts on a 2 week schedule, so our next round should be around January 23rd.
Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify and the Mruby project!
